Spearmoot.name: Spearmoot
description: Spearmoot is an annual festival holiday that occurs in many parts of Centhris, especially regions with feudal traditions that employ levied troops.

Tradition of the Conqueror: The first instances of Spearmoot were started by clerics of the Conqueror in places with strong military traditions. The Cult of the Conqueror encourages a regular inspection of individuals capable of military service so that a lord is never caught off guard in terms of preparation.
